admission_text:
## Membership Benefits

Invitations to exclusive, members-only events, previews, and fundraisers

Discounted admissions to Friday evening [Soundscapes concerts](/web/20251114154557/https://knoxart.org/events)

Free admission to other national museums based on membership level

Discounts in the [Museum Shop](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114154557/https://knoxart.org/museum-shop/)

Subscription to [CANVAS](/web/20251114154557/https://knoxart.org/museum-resources), the museumâ€™s monthly newsletter

Opportunity to join additional auxiliary museum groups

Discounts to summer camps, workshops, and art classes

Recognition in our Annual Report and other areas as designated by membership level

All KMA memberships are active for 12 months on date of purchase

[Become a Member](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114154557/https://knoxart.ejoinme.org/MyPages/Membership/tabid/146451/Default.aspx)

[Compare Memberships](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114154557/https://knoxart.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Compare-KMA-Memberships.png)

## Membership Levels

### Individual | $50

  * 1 free pass to Soundscapes at the KMA
  * Recognition in annual report
  * Discounts on workshops and art classes
  * Subscription to _CANVAS_ , the KMA newsletter
  * Membership in [SEMC Reciprocal Museum Programs**](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114154557/https://www.semcdirect.net/SERM-Participants)
  * Invitations to member-only parties and events
  * Summer Art Academy discount
  * 10% Museum Shop disc...
